article_title: Israel announces military pause on Gaza road to let in aid
sentence: The  IDF  said  eight  Israeli  soldiers  were  killed  in  an  explosion  in  Rafah  on  Saturday  -  the  deadliest  incident  for  the  army  in  the  war  since  January.

article_title: Israel announces military pause on Gaza road to let in aid
sentence: The  war  began  after  Hamas  attacked  Israel  on  7  October,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  taking  251  others  back  to  Gaza  as  hostages.

article_title: Israel announces military pause on Gaza road to let in aid
sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says  more  than  37,000  Palestinians  have  been  killed  since  the  start  of  the  war,  and  many  hundreds  of  thousands  more  have  been  injured  or  displaced.
